start_boss.text: Hey knucklehead, you ain't gonna win.
I gotta bucket of chicken and I'm here to kick ass! And I'm all outta chicken...so I lied about the chicken.

retreat.text: Ok, they got lucky once! Nobody gets lucky twice, though. It's impossible.
'Kay, this does not look good here, um...

out_of_missiles.text: Oh no! I knew dis would happen! I foresaw dis!
Ok guys, bad news: we lost that last one. Good news: you still got me.

engaged.text: You're a disgrace to the uniform, pal!
I'm gonna headbutt cha', I'm gonna headbutt cha', I'm gonna headbutt cha'!
Ya got anything smart ta say now?
I am owning you, you fat, bald, fatty fat... fat fat!
Man, it is unfair how good I am!

need_help.text: Get on the freakin' point dumbass!
Dat ain't da right way, guys!

pursuing.text: That fancy scope of yours, betcha got a real good view of me killin' ya!
Here's a schematic for ya: my ass!

running.text: Oh my God! Oh my God! OH MY GOD!
Yeah, dis is how winners run!

hull_50.text: Is-is anybody even payin' attention ta me?

overload.text: It's startin' to bore me how much you suck.

death.text: Scary Hat! This is all your fault!
Don't look at me, I'm slightly less handsome!

victory.text: Alright, yeah, that's- naw, that's a pretty good job.
Say goodbye to ya kneecaps, chucklehead!
